dcterms:creator: T. Young
F. Z. Xing
V. Pandelea
J. Ni
E. Cambria
dcterms:description: This dataset expands or rewrites each conversation based on the task-oriented task. By annotating the original TOD data with additional rounds of context-semantically relevant open-domain dialogue, a conversation can contain multiple dialogue patterns while increasing the average number of turns by 5.8.
dcterms:title: FusedChat

dcterms:creator: P. Budzianowski
T. Wen
B. Tseng
I. Casanueva
S. Ultes
O. Ramadan
M. Gasic
dcterms:description: This dataset is one of the most prevalent datasets in task-oriented dialogue systems, collected via Wizard-of-Oz, and contains a total of 8438/1000/1000 multiturn dialogues. It is designed for goal-directed task-oriented dialogue modeling.
dcterms:title: MultiWOZ 2.0

dcterms:creator: M. Eric
R. Goel

S. Gao

A. K. Goyal

D. Hakkani-TÃ¼r
dcterms:description: MultiWOZ 2.1 is a version of the MultiWOZ dataset with several buggy annotations fixed. It serves as a consolidated multi-domain dialogue dataset with state corrections and state tracking baselines.
dcterms:title: MultiWOZ 2.1
